text: Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar thugara phɨrav, khueŋ bun nzuav khaŋ nzuai, zumgum Zisas taagi zirɨrga tuk han mbararga, gumgi thari, mbe guigira Zisas khothɨgi tɨv, mbe ana kuegɨrga. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, mbe wari wo khuarir bigi guiguigi ŋiniŋgi mbatɨgi nzuai bunin tɨgɨp, mba ŋiniŋgi mbatɨgi nzuai buni, mbe nta zɨn ŋgɨrga.
